Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command for new trivia question.

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: The cooldown for the 'new question' command

OpenOverlayInBrowser.label: OPEN OVERLAY IN BROWSER
OpenOverlayInBrowser.tooltip: Opens the overlay in browser for testing

QuestionResponse.label: Question Response
QuestionResponse.value: ::TRIVIA QUESTION:: CATEGORY: $triviacategory :: DIFFICULTY: $triviadifficulty :: POINTS: $triviapoints\n$triviaquestion :: $triviaanswers Use $triviaanswercommand <number> to answer

CorrectResponse.label: Correct Response
CorrectResponse.value: @$username -> You got the correct answer: '$triviacorrect' and have been awarded $triviapoints $currencyname.
CorrectResponse.tooltip: Message to send on a correct answer to the trivia question

ClearResponse.label: Clear Response
ClearResponse.value: @$username -> You have cleared the current trivia question. The correct answer was '$triviacorrect'.
ClearResponse.tooltip: Message to send when the current trivia question was cleared.

AlreadyAnsweredResponse.label: Already Answered Response
AlreadyAnsweredResponse.value: @$username -> You have already made an incorrect guess on the current question.
AlreadyAnsweredResponse.tooltip: Message to send when a user tries to guess more than once.

IncorrectResponse.label: Incorrect Response
IncorrectResponse.value: @$username -> That is not the correct answer.
IncorrectResponse.tooltip: Message to send when a user guesses incorrectly.

TimeoutResponse.label: Answer Timeout Response
TimeoutResponse.value: No one got the correct answer. The correct answer was '$triviacorrect'.
TimeoutResponse.tooltip:
Message to send when a user guesses incorrectly.
$triviacorrect = The correct answer

UnknownAnswerResponse.label: Unknown Answer Response
UnknownAnswerResponse.tooltip: Message to send when a user guesses incorrectly.

TimeToAnswer.label: Time To Answer (seconds)
TimeToAnswer.tooltip: The amount of time people get to answer a question.

PointsEasy.label: Easy Difficulty
PointsEasy.tooltip: The Number of points to award to the user for a easy difficulty question.

PointsMedium.label: Medium Difficulty
PointsMedium.tooltip: The Number of points to award to the user for a medium difficulty question.

PointsHard.label: Hard Difficulty
PointsHard.tooltip: The Number of points to award to the user for a hard difficulty question.

UserColor.label: User Color
UserColor.tooltip: The color of the user that got the correct answer

CommandColor.label: Command Color
CommandColor.tooltip: Color of the command in the help text.
